trial_identification.studytitle: Extension Study for Patients Who Have Participated in a BMN 701 Study
trial_identification.scientifictitle: A Long-Term Study for Extended BMN 701 Treatment of Patients With Pompe Disease Who Have Participated in a BMN 701 Study

conditioncode.conditioncode2: Other human genetics and inherited disorders

interventions.interventions:
Other interventions - BMN 701
Experimental: Experimental: BMN 701 -
Other interventions: BMN 701 GILT-tagged recombinant human GAA

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Mean distance walked as measured by the Six-minute Walk Test (6MWT)

recruitment.hospital: Royal Brisbane and Women's Hospital - Herston

ethicsAndSummary.summary: This is a Phase 2 open-label, multiple dose study of BMN 701 administered by IV infusion every 2 weeks (qow) to patients with late-onset Pompe disease.
